renderer.description: Render an HTML "a" anchor element. The value of the component is rendered as the value of the "href" attribute. Any child UIParameter components are appended to the String to be output as the value of the "href" attribute as query parameters before rendering. The entire "href" string must be passed through a call to the encodeResourceURL() method of the ExternalContext. The name of the UIParameter goes on the left hand side, and the value of the UIParameter on the right hand side. The name and the value must be URLEncoded. Each UIParameter instance is separated by an ampersand, as dictated in the URL spec. If the "styleClass" attribute is specified, render its value as the value of the "class" attribute.
